sourcesContent:
import "./sm.css" export default function Sm5() { return (

Mental healings in modern times

  • Give your subconscious mind something good to work on as you drop off into slumber
  • Stop talking about your ailments or giving them a name. The only sap from which they draw life is your attention and fear of them
  • Fill your mind with the great truths of life and walk forward in the light of love
  • Know that belief is a thought in your mind and what you think you create
) }
